attributes.action: Minimum 10 year prison sentence for assaulting  emergency service personnel .
attributes.additional_details: Recruit at least 30,00 more police officers.
attributes.background: Give the police more powers and tougher sentences as petty crime is getting higher each week.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do to give the police more powers. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You might like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/549032
